intro: Palicourea ctenocalyx, commonly known as the featherleaf palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its slender, branched stems and small, opposite leaves with a distinctive feather-like appearance. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, clustered in small inflorescences. Palicourea ctenocalyx is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
